name: Twiddle: The Maze
description:
A circular 3D maze divided in "rings" that could be rotated to create a path the player can go through to get to the exit. Collect keys and arrive to the exit within a limited number of ring turns. By the end of the level check the Op Art piece you made!

PC version: download, install, double-click the "MyProject.exe" inside main folder.
Controls: wasd to move player; click and drag mouse to look around; space bar to zoom in (walk in maze) and zoom out (turn rings using side arrows of keyboard).

Take a peek about the game here.

Team: Kelle Lima, Lulu Hedrick, Mark Smith, Minal Kalkute, and Shuo Shan.
